description: Creates a watchlist that fraudsters can be a part of.

parameters.name: ClientToken
parameters.description: A unique, case-sensitive identifier that you provide to ensure the idempotency of the request. If not provided, the Amazon Web Services SDK populates this field. For more information about idempotency, see Making retries safe with idempotent APIs. This field is autopopulated if not provided.

parameters.name: DomainId
parameters.description: The identifier of the domain that contains the watchlist.

nested_items.name: Watchlist
nested_items.description: Information about the newly created watchlist.

nested_items.name: CreatedAt
nested_items.description: The timestamp of when the watchlist was created.

nested_items.name: DefaultWatchlist
nested_items.description: Whether the specified watchlist is the default watchlist of a domain.

nested_items.name: DomainId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the domain that contains the watchlist.

nested_items.name: UpdatedAt
nested_items.description: The timestamp of when the watchlist was updated.
